So what makes OpenSea different?

OpenSea combines all your daily operations.
You don't need to switch between fax, email
or skype any more, nor to worry whether your message reached the recipient.

All users have transparent reputation.
It helps to reduce risk to enter negotiations with the incompetent partner. Each successful transportation reinforce your brand.
